ingredients: 10 pounds apples, quartered, 4 cups unsweetened apple juice, 1 cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cloves,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground allspice, 6  half-pint canning jars with lids and rings
